name: Poop With Your Dad Simulator 2016 Ludumdare October Challenge
name_original: Poop With Your Dad Simulator 2016 Ludumdare October Challenge
description:
Release 1.0:

  • NEW GAME MODE
  • NEW SOUNDS
  • ADDED GINGER GUY
  • ADDED GINGER CHILD
  • ADDED DARK COLORED CHILD
  • ADDED HI SCORE FOR NEW GAMEMODE
  • ADDED A NEW CURSOR
  • NEW ANIMATIONS
  • BUG FIXES (LOTS OF THEM)

Update 1.1 Hotfix:

  • Bugs in the new gamemode fixed including restarting still counting you dead and therefor moves on to hi score screen.

GOING FREE TO PLAY

The development of this game will continue, just not as much as it used to!

By paying the above price you contribute to the development of this game.

If you give a dollar or more your name will be in the credits!
